title: Mayura Kasu Pendant - A Regal Touch of Tradition
materials: Ruby Accent Stone. Meticulously crafted with traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite pendant features a stunning peacock (Mayura) motif, a symbol of beauty and royalty in South Indian culture. The intricate filigree work and pave-set CZ diamonds emulate the grandeur of traditional Kasu Haram designs. The ruby accent stone adds a pop of color and elegance. The design allows this piece to be added to an existing haram or choker.
occasions: festive occasions like Ugadi and Sankranti
and special events where you want to showcase your heritage with grace. Perfect for pairing with a Kanjeevaram saree or a traditional Langa Voni.
description: This Mayura Kasu Pendant is more than just jewelry; it's a statement of cultural pride and timeless elegance. The superior craftsmanship, combined with high-quality materials, ensures a piece that will be cherished for generations. The versatile design allows it to be styled with various outfits, blending seamlessly with both traditional and contemporary aesthetics. Own a piece of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
